verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. When Jehovah<WH3068> brought back<WH7725> those that returned<WH7725> to Zion<WH6726>, We were like unto them that dream<WH2492>.

Then was our mouth<WH6310> filled<WH4390> with laughter<WH7814>, And our tongue<WH3956> with singing<WH7440>: Then said<WH559> they among the nations<WH1471>, Jehovah<WH3068> hath done<WH6213> great things for them<WH1431>.
Jehovah <WH3068> hath done<WH6213> great things<WH1431> for us<WH8056>, Whereof we are glad.
Turn again<WH7725> our captivity<WH7622>, O Jehovah<WH3068>, As the streams<WH650> in the South<WH5045>.
They that sow<WH2232> in tears<WH1832> shall reap<WH7114> in joy<WH7440>.

He that goeth<WH3212> forth<WH1980> and weepeth<WH1058>, bearing<WH5375> seed<WH2233> for sowing<WH4901>, Shall doubtless<WH935> come<WH935> again with joy<WH7440>, bringing<WH5375> his sheaves with him<WH485>.
